title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API, supports Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with batch scripting, config profiles, and colored output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, JSON-mode, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official Docker image with CUDA runtime for GPU-accelerated inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client crate for Ollama with Tokio async support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama service containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer and streaming support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF models optimized for Ollama with performance notes.
